scripts.start: npm run replica && npm run deploy-local && npm run decl && cd frontend && npm run start && cd ..
scripts.create-canisters: dfx canister create main --no-wallet --specified-id 2d2zu-vaaaa-aaaak-qb6pq-cai && dfx canister create assets --no-wallet
scripts.replica: dfx stop && dfx start --clean --background && npm run create-canisters
scripts.decl: npm run decl:cli && npm run decl:frontend
scripts.decl:cli: dfx generate main && dfx generate bench
scripts.deploy-staging: NODE_ENV=production IDENTITY=mops DFX_NETWORK=staging npm run deploy
scripts.deploy-ic: NODE_ENV=production IDENTITY=mops DFX_NETWORK=ic npm run deploy
scripts.deploy:main: NODE_ENV=development IDENTITY=default DFX_NETWORK=local npm run deploy main
scripts.postinstall: (cd frontend && npm install) && (cd cli && npm install) && (cd docs && npm install)
